snippet: At a City Council hearing, the two companies said that they had resumed negotiations over retransmission fees.
abstract: Time Warner Cable and CBS resume negotiations over retransmission fees at City Council hearing as blackout, catching millions of viewers in the country in middle of quarrel over cost of putting broadcast stations on cable systems, goes into its seventh day.
lead_paragraph: At a City Council hearing, the two companies said that they had resumed negotiations over retransmission fees.

headline.main: Time Warner Cable and CBS Are Scolded Over Blackout
headline.print_headline: Time Warner Cable and CBS Are Scolded Over Blackout
